description.name: Developing adaptive landing pages and websites of various complexity levels based on WordPress (ACF, Elementor);
Participating in team calls to discuss company goals and improvement methods;
Approving and correcting design layouts for landing pages;
Making edits, and improving existing websites and other projects.
Adhering to the workflow and reporting on the status of tasks in Google Spreadsheet;
Attending regular Zoom meetings with the team and actively working in a team to achieve development goals;
UI/UX Design, Responsive Design, JavaScript Development, Component-Based Architecture, Web Performance Optimization, Server-Side Logic, API Development, Database Management;
